command.description: Simple notification client that connects to a notification server and listens for notifications.

option.name: verbose
option.description: Sets verbosity level. Use multiples for more detail (e.g. "-vv").

option.name: timeout
option.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds. If not set, defaults to 1000.

argument.name: address
argument.description: Address of notification server. Must be a web-socket address in the form ws://hostname:port/.
